name: Shadow Brick Master
description:
Think faster than the rest. The more you play, the better you will be. It is fun to play but hard to master.
Beat the bricks that come towards you. Land on the same color to stay alive and keep going further. Fun to play but hard to master. How far can you go?

Click on your screen to turn the player.

Do not click on external links buttons (they do not work for online play).
